text:
regnancy, Labour and the Post-partum Period
/circle6 Plot the fi  rst recording of cervical dilatation on the Alert line. Write the time accordingly 
in the corresponding row for time. Aft er four hours, conduct a vaginal examination and 
plot the cervical dilatation in centimeters on the graph.
/circle6 If the Alert line is crossed (the plotting moves to the right of the Alert line), it 
indicates prolonged/obstructed labour and you should be alert that something is 
abnormal with the labour.
/
